T02D1247:196a-1: sa ha dza sadyo ga britti garbha pra k'a she n'a ma /
T02D1247:196a-3: lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor dam pa'i 'grel pa
T02D1247:196a-4: snying po rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya
T02D1247:196a-5: ba / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1247:196a-6: mchog gi gnas ni spyod yul gang 'gyur ba //
T02D1247:196a-7: sna tshogs rnam rtog dra ba'i mi gtsang khengs //
T02D1247:196a-8: dri med mtha' yas go 'phang 'jig rten thob //
T02D1247:196a-9: rdo rje mgon de mi mnyam mgo bos 'dud //
T02D1247:196a-10: kun rdzob don dam dbye bas rtogs 'gyur ba //
T02D1247:196a-11: gnyis te gnyis med ngo bo mi bzad pa //
T02D1247:196a-12: gang las lhan skyes nyams myong go 'phang thob //
T02D1247:196a-13: lha mchog mchod sbyin de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1247:196a-14: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud las byung //
T02D1247:196a-15: dpal ldan rin chen 'byung gnas mdzad //
T02D1247:196a-16: blo bzang rnam dpyad rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1247:196a-17: lhan skyes rnal 'byor dbye bar bya //
T02D1247:196a-18: de la re zhig slob dpon gyis dgyes rdor rgyu
T02D1247:196a-19: mthun dang bcas dam pa ni zhes bya ba la
T02D1247:196a-20: sogs pa'i mthun pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i tshigs su bcad
T02D1247:196a-21: pa'i sgo nas rab tu byed pa ma lus pa'i
T02D1247:196a-22: brjod par bya ba bstan pa yin te mdor bsdus
T02D1247:196a-23: pa'i don to // de'i rgyas par bshad pa 'di yin te //
T02D1247:196a-24: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dam pa la rab tu
T02D1247:196a-25: btud de zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal nas rdzogs
T02D1247:196a-26: pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su mngon par rtogs pa ji
T02D1247:196b-0: ltar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag @196b gis bshad par
T02D1247:196b-2: sngon du ni phyin ci ma log par rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1247:196b-3: dgyes pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin rab tu byed pa
T02D1247:196b-4: gang gis rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni mngon par
T02D1247:196b-5: rtogs pa'o // rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1247:196b-6: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1247:196b-7: dgyes rdor rgyu mthun dang bcas zhes pa ni rgyu
T02D1247:196b-8: mthun ni rgyu dang 'dra ba ste de dang bcas
T02D1247:196b-9: pa'o // dgyes rdor nyid rgyu mthun te /
T02D1247:196b-10: de dang bcas par shes par bya'o //
T02D1247:196b-11: dam pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1247:196b-12: de gang gi phyir 'dir ni rgyal mtshan dang mchog
T02D1247:196b-13: gi yan lag yang dag par reg pas bde ba
T02D1247:196b-14: chen po'i 'khor lo la 'dzag cing byang chub sems
T02D1247:196b-15: kyi thig le'i dga' ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1247:196b-16: nyid nyams su myong ste dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1247:196b-17: bde ba nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de
T02D1247:196b-18: ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i lhan cig skyes pa
T02D1247:196b-19: ste de nyid dgyes rdor zhes bya bar bshad pa
T02D1247:196b-20: yin no // de yang dpe las byung ba'i ngo
T02D1247:196b-21: bo chos kyi sku'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1247:196b-22: gyi rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo rnam grangs can gyi
T02D1247:196b-23: rgyu mthun zhes bshad pa yin no //
T02D1247:196b-25: de dag las ni mkha' dang mtshungs //
T02D1247:196b-26: gang de skyob pa chos sku yin //
T02D1247:196b-27: gang zhig zla ba rdzogs 'dra ba //
T02D1247:196b-28: de ni longs spyod rdzogs sku'o //
T02D1247:196b-31: gang zhig ye shes gnyis su med //
T02D1247:196b-32: ces bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1247:196b-33: de ltar na rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor skar
T02D1247:196b-34: ma'i bdag por phyin ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i
T02D1247:196b-35: lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong ba'o //
T02D1247:196b-36: gang zhig rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos dbyings nyams
T02D1247:196b-37: su myong ba de ni chos kyi sku'i lhan cig
T02D1247:196b-38: skyes pa'o // ri bong gis mtshan pa rdo rje
T02D1247:196b-39: las 'byung zhing mtsho skyes kyi nang du gnas na
T02D1247:196b-40: de'i tshe sprul pa'i sku dang sbyar bar bya ste
T02D1247:196b-41: skyes pa'o // / snga ma'i slob dpon rnams kyi sku gsum bstan pa'i gdams ngag yin no //
T02D1247:196b-42: phyag 'tshal ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di la yang 'brel ba la sogs pa rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1247:197a-1: par rtogs pa ni brjod pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i
T02D1247:197a-2: 'khor lo dang dgyes pa'i rdo rje dag brjod par
T02D1247:197a-3: bya'o // de dag la spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo
T02D1247:197a-4: nas thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i dngos po'i 'brel
T02D1247:197a-5: bya'o // pa'o // kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i
T02D1247:197a-6: rang bzhin gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa gnyis
T02D1247:197a-7: nyams su myong ba ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1247:197a-8: bdag nyid kyis lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong
T02D1247:197a-9: nas gzhan rnams la yang de nyid rab tu bstan
T02D1247:197a-10: pas byang chub bsgrub pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o
T02D1247:197a-11: // da ni slob dpon gyis brtag pa dang po'i
T02D1247:197a-12: le'u brgyad pa las gsungs pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa
T02D1247:197a-14: mkha' dbyings bha gar bsams nas ni //
T02D1247:197a-15: dbus su bsgom par bya ba ste //
T02D1247:197a-17: lha rnams ji ltar byung ba'o //
T02D1247:197a-19: de'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D1247:197a-20: stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyi nas chos 'byung gi phyag rgya rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1247:197a-21: de'i steng du 'khor lo sngon 'gro ci rigs pa /
T02D1247:197a-22: lha rnams zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1247:197a-23: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi yang dag par bsams te /
T02D1247:197a-24: de'i 'og tu rnal 'byor pas bya ba'i tshogs bya ba yin no /
T02D1247:197a-26: ji ltar 'byung ba'i sgras ni sgom pa po bstan no //
T02D1247:197a-27: de ci'i phyir gang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim
T02D1247:197a-28: pas de dang de sgom pa po'i sems dang gnyis
T02D1247:197a-29: su med pa'i rnam pa can no //
T02D1247:197a-32: ci rigs pa ni mi yin te /
T02D1247:197a-33: lha rnams klu ni chen po ste //
T02D1247:197a-34: ji ltar byung ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1247:197a-35: zhes bya ba bdag med pa'i le'u brgyad pa las gsungs so //
T02D1247:197a-36: 'dir yang 'khor lo la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis
T02D1247:197a-37: sa la sogs pa ni chos kyi brda 'am rig
T02D1247:197a-38: pa'i sgo nas mu tig gi phreng ba las bstan
T02D1247:197a-39: pa ste / de nyid las shes par bya'o //
T02D1247:197a-40: de ni drang ba'i don to //
T02D1247:197a-42: bya ba la sogs pas rgyas par bshad pa'i sgo nas nges pa'i don bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1247:197a-43: gnas la byed pa zhugs nas ni //
T02D1247:197a-44: zhes bya ba la mtsho skyes la rgyal mtshan 'jug ste /
T02D1247:197a-45: sgrub pa po yis bya ba bya //
T02D1247:197b-0: sgrub pa'i dus su 'gro ba @197b dang 'ong ba
T02D1247:197b-1: la sogs pa'i bde bas bde bar gyur pa'i bya
T02D1247:197b-2: ba dag rnal 'byor pas bya ba yin no //
T02D1247:197b-3: de'i rjes la sgrub pa po'i yan lag nyams su
T02D1247:197b-4: myong ba'i skad cig ma la 'bras bu rnal 'byor
T02D1247:197b-5: ma'i 'khor lo zhes pa ni dang po'i yan lag
T02D1247:197b-6: gsum rgyu ba'i rang bzhin du nyams su myong la
T02D1247:197b-7: / bla na med pa dang gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1247:197b-8: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku'i lhan
T02D1247:197b-9: cig skyes pa'i rnam grangs can /
T02D1247:197b-10: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i sgras byed
T02D1247:197b-11: par bya ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid
T02D1247:197b-12: kyi ngo bo 'bras bu yin no zhes ston to
T02D1247:197b-13: // de'i rgyu mthun he tu ka'o //
T02D1247:197b-14: zhes bya ba la dpe las byung ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1247:197b-15: gyi chos kyi sku'i lhan cig skyes pa gang yin
T02D1247:197b-16: pa de'i rgyu mthun ni rgyu dang mthun pa'i 'bras
T02D1247:197b-17: bu ste / dpe'i rang bzhin gyi longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1247:197b-18: pa'i sku'i lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid he ru
T02D1247:197b-19: bu ste / ka ni // kun rdzob kyi byang
T02D1247:197b-20: chub sems kyi ngo bo yin no zhes pa'i tha
T02D1247:197b-21: bu ste / ka ni // tshig go / chos
T02D1247:197b-22: kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i
T02D1247:197b-23: sku dag sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung
T02D1247:197b-24: ngo zhes theg pa chen bo la yang bstan pa
T02D1247:197b-26: gzhan du yang skyes bu gnas pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1247:197b-27: yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba ste //
T02D1247:197b-28: rtsig pa la sogs bstan pa rnams //
T02D1247:197b-31: de bas na 'dir yang dpe ni /
T02D1247:197b-32: lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i dpe las byung ba'i phyir /
T02D1247:197b-33: chos kyi sku'i rgyud mthun du bshad pa yin no //
T02D1247:197b-34: 'dir yang khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos
T02D1247:197b-35: kyi skus longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku khyab pa ste
T02D1247:197b-36: / chos kyi sku'i rgyu mthun nyid du bshad pa yin no //
T02D1247:197b-37: bskyed pa'i phyogs su zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1247:197b-38: dga' ba la sogs pa'i skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid
T02D1247:197b-39: dang mi mthun pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1247:197b-40: so sor ston pa yin te /
T02D1247:197b-41: 'dir bskyed pa'i phyogs ni dga' ba la sogs pa
T02D1247:197b-42: rnams 'byung ba'i rang bzhin nyid du 'dod pa yin
T02D1247:197b-43: te / zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa
T02D1247:197b-44: yongs su gyur pa las 'byung ba'i lha'i mtshan nyid
T02D1247:198a-0: de gang gi phyir bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo @198a * //
T02D1247:198a-1: las byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'dzag na 'dab
T02D1247:198a-2: ma bcu drug gi padma'i gnas su phyin pa'i tshe
T02D1247:198a-3: skad cig ma dang por dga' ba 'char ba yin
T02D1247:198a-4: no // de'i rjes la yan lag thams cad kyi tshigs khyab pa'i tshe /
T02D1247:198a-5: skad cig ma gnyis pa mchog dga' 'char ba yin no//
T02D1247:198a-6: de nas rdo rje rtse mor phyin pa'i tshe skad
T02D1247:198a-7: cig ma gsum pa la lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'
T02D1247:198a-9: de'i 'og tu mchog tu yan lag la spro ba'i
T02D1247:198a-10: tshe skad cig ma bzhi pa la dga' bral 'char
T02D1247:198a-11: ba yin te / dga' ba rnams kyi bskyed pa'i phyogs de lta bur shes par bya'o //
T02D1247:198a-12: de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i don dam pa dang
T02D1247:198a-13: kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam pa gnyis bstan par
T02D1247:198a-14: bya ba'i phyir / de nyid 'dir ni rnam pa gnyis //
T02D1247:198a-16: gcig ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1247:198a-17: gzhan ni zla ba rdzogs pa bzhin //
T02D1247:198a-19: dang po'i tshig rkang gnyis kyis mdor bstan pa dang /
T02D1247:198a-20: de nas tshig rkang gnyis kyis rgyas par bstan pa'o //
T02D1247:198a-21: de dag las ni mkha' dang mtshungs //
T02D1247:198a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas slar yang bshad par bya ste /
T02D1247:198a-23: 'dir mkha' dang mtshungs pa ni gang zhig gzung ba dang /
T02D1247:198a-24: 'dzin pa gnyis dang bral ba rdzas ma yin pa'i
T02D1247:198a-25: ngo bo bde ba chen po rang rig pa'i chos
T02D1247:198a-26: nyid nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa
T02D1247:198a-27: de ni skyob pa rnams ni phung po lnga'i rang
T02D1247:198a-28: bzhin du bsdu ba'i bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnams
T02D1247:198a-29: kyi chos kyi sku ni khyab byed kyi ngo bo
T02D1247:198a-30: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi
T02D1247:198a-31: bdag nyid dpe las byung ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1247:198a-32: bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid du bshad pa yin
T02D1247:198a-33: no // gang zhig zla ba rdzogs 'dra ba //
T02D1247:198a-34: zhes pa ni dpe'i ngo bo lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1247:198a-35: bde ba rdzas kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de
T02D1247:198a-36: ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o zhes bya ba la
T02D1247:198a-37: longs spyod rdzogs pas ni longs spyod rdzogs pa ste
T02D1247:198a-38: / dpe'i bde ba'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi
T02D1247:198a-39: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin no zhes ston to
T02D1247:198a-40: / // de nyid rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes
T02D1247:198a-41: bya ba la sogs pas 'das ma thag tu bshad
T02D1247:198b-0: pa'i don kho na rab tu bstan pa @198b ste
T02D1247:198b-1: / // ; gzhan du bshad par mi bya'o //
T02D1247:198b-2: da ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bsgom pa'i yan lag bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1247:198b-3: 'dir mngon par rtogs pa 'di yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1247:198b-4: dpa' bo gcig pu ni rnam par rtog pa thams
T02D1247:198b-5: cad kyi dra ba dang bral ba rnal 'byor pa
T02D1247:198b-6: gang yin pa de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
T02D1247:198b-7: bdag nyid he ru kar mos shing zhes bya ba
T02D1247:198b-8: ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D1247:198b-9: rang gi bdag nyid lhag par mos pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1247:198b-10: kyi rnal 'byor gyis he ru ka'i rang bzhin du
T02D1247:198b-12: yid kyis gang yang rung ba bkug ste /
T02D1247:198b-13: zhes bya ba ni gang zhig sngar rnal 'byor pa
T02D1247:198b-14: dga' ba la zhugs pa'i 'khyud pa la sogs pas
T02D1247:198b-15: sems gzung zhing shin tu dga' ba la sogs pa
T02D1247:198b-16: bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid
T02D1247:198b-17: ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ngo bo bdag med ma'i
T02D1247:198b-19: kakko la bo la'i ril pa'am /
T02D1247:198b-20: zhes bya ba ni yid kyis sprul pa'i rig ma
T02D1247:198b-21: gang yin pa de'i kakko lar bo la'i rol pa
T02D1247:198b-22: bsgom zhing / don dam pa ni gnyis su med
T02D1247:198b-23: pa'i ye shes mngon par phyogs par bya'o zhes gong
T02D1247:198b-25: 'di tsam gyis ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bstan to //
T02D1247:198b-26: yang na bo la'i bu gar zhes bya ba la
T02D1247:198b-27: sogs pas phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag bshad par
T02D1247:198b-28: bya ste / rang gi snying ga dang lte ba
T02D1247:198b-29: las 'byung ba'i thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par
T02D1247:198b-30: rol pa bsgom pa zhes bya ba la lte ba
T02D1247:198b-31: ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba ste /
T02D1247:198b-32: de la gnas pa'i shes rab ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1247:198b-33: ma bdag med ma'i ngo bo dbyings kyi dang po'o
T02D1247:198b-34: // snying ga la gnas pa'i thabs ni padma 'dab
T02D1247:198b-35: ma brgyad pa'i lte ba la gnas pa'i dpal he
T02D1247:198b-36: ru ka'i rang bzhin sprin gyi sgra'o //
T02D1247:198b-38: snying ga las babs pa de dag nang gi shes rab dang thabs yin te /
T02D1247:198b-39: gsang ba'i rdo rje'i bu gar phyin pa dang /
T02D1247:198b-40: de dag gi rnam par rol pa ni bde ba
T02D1247:198b-41: chen po nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin gang yin
T02D1247:198b-42: pa de nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgom zhing /
T02D1247:198b-43: don dam par mngon par phyogs par bya ba ni
T02D1247:198b-44: de dang ro gcig pa nyid la brten par bya'o
T02D1247:199a-0: zhes ston to // 'di tsam gyis ni phyag rgya chen @199a * //
T02D1247:199a-2: ji ltar mngon par phyogs par byas pa zhes bya
T02D1247:199a-3: ba la sogs pa bla na med pa dang gnyis
T02D1247:199a-4: su med pa'i ngo bo bde ba chen po de
T02D1247:199a-5: nyid snang ba med cing gsal ba tsam zhes bya
T02D1247:199a-6: ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1247:199a-7: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin gang la med pa
T02D1247:199a-8: de ni snang ba med pa'o //
T02D1247:199a-9: de lta bu yin na yang gsal ba tsam ni
T02D1247:199a-10: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis ye shes kyi chos
T02D1247:199a-12: mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1247:199a-13: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1247:199a-14: rtogs pa'i chos kyi sku'i ngo bo ji srid nus
T02D1247:199a-15: pa de srid du blta bar bya ba ni 'dir
T02D1247:199a-16: lta ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par de'i rang bzhin
T02D1247:199a-18: 'di tsam gyis ni rang gi bdag nyid lhan cig
T02D1247:199a-19: skyes pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du bltas
T02D1247:199a-20: la / g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba'i dngos po
T02D1247:199a-21: thams cad kyang de'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o
T02D1247:199a-22: la / zhes bstan to ; /'dir ni rigs pa 'di yin te /
T02D1247:199a-23: chos nyid ni khyab par byed pa ste /
T02D1247:199a-24: de nyid chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1247:199a-25: bde ba chen po de nyid kyis chos thams cad khyab pa ste /
T02D1247:199a-26: chos rnams dang chos nyid la de'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1247:199a-27: 'brel ba yod pas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i
T02D1247:199a-28: dngos po thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1247:199a-29: du grub pa kho na yin no //
T02D1247:199a-30: ji skad du chos las chos nyid tha mi dad pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T02D1247:199a-31: 'o na gal te de ltar yin na sgom pa don med pa yin no zhe na /
T02D1247:199a-32: smras pa blo bur ba'i dri ma rnam par dag
T02D1247:199a-33: pa'i dbye ba de la yod pa ma yin te
T02D1247:199a-34: / sgom pa don med pa ma yin no //
T02D1247:199a-35: 'di tsam gyis ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
T02D1247:199a-36: langs nas kyang dngos po thams cad zhes bya ba
T02D1247:199a-37: la sogs pas gnyis pa mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i
T02D1247:199a-39: 'dir yang sngar bshad pa'i brjod par bya ba kho na yin te bshad zin to //
T02D1247:199a-40: srog chags thams cad bdag las byung //
T02D1247:199a-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i
T02D1247:199a-42: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis 'das ma thag tu bshad
T02D1247:199a-43: pa'i don dang rjes su mthun pa kho na yin
T02D1247:199a-44: te de gzhan du bshad par mi bya'o //
T02D1247:199b-0: @199b ldang ba'i rnal 'byor ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1247:199b-1: yang dang yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rnal 'byor
T02D1247:199b-2: gnyis po la yang rgyun ma chad pa nyid bstan
T02D1247:199b-3: to // chu bo'i rgyun ni rgyu ba bzhin //
T02D1247:199b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas
T02D1247:199b-5: de kho na nyid yin te gzhan gyi rnal 'byor
T02D1247:199b-7: ji ltar chu bo'i rgyun ma chad par chu'i rgyun rnams rgyu ba de bzhin du rgyu ba dang /
T02D1247:199b-8: mar me'i snang ba'i rgyun rgyu ba de bzhin du
T02D1247:199b-9: de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis gnas par
T02D1247:199b-10: bya ba ni rnal 'byor gnyis khyab par byed pa'o
T02D1247:199b-11: // rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid kyi rnal
T02D1247:199b-12: 'byor gyi dus thams cad du rnal 'byor pas gnas
T02D1247:199b-14: de gang gi phyir de kho na nyid kyi rnal
T02D1247:199b-15: 'byor mi shes pas mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1247:199b-16: ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'dra
T02D1247:199b-17: bar 'gyur te / de kho na nyid kyi rnal
T02D1247:199b-18: 'byor shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod lam bzhi'i
T02D1247:199b-19: rang bzhin gyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi las gang
T02D1247:199b-20: yang rung ba byed na de dag thams cad de
T02D1247:199b-21: rnams la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang
T02D1247:199b-23: rang gis rig pa'i ye shes 'di //
T02D1247:199b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nye bar bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1247:199b-25: sa dang chu dang me dang ni //
T02D1247:199b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1247:199b-27: gnyis kyis mthong ba'i chos las 'gyur ba'i phan yon
T02D1247:199b-28: bstan to // da ni rnal 'byor la 'di'i gnas
T02D1247:199b-29: skabs kyi dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1247:199b-30: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas
T02D1247:199b-31: skabs kyi dbye ba rnam pa bzhi ru bstan pa
T02D1247:199b-32: bstan to // yin te / 'dir gal te lhan
T02D1247:199b-33: cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ngo bo gcig yin pa'i
T02D1247:199b-34: phyir de la gnas skabs kyi dbye ba yod pa
T02D1247:199b-35: bstan to // yin te / ma yin te /
T02D1247:199b-36: 'on kyang de la brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa la
T02D1247:199b-37: rim gyis de dang de'i rnam par snang ba'i phyir
T02D1247:199b-38: gnas skabs kyi dbye ba bstan to //
T02D1247:199b-39: de gang gi phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1247:199b-40: slob bzhin pas ro lhan cig skyes pa'i ro gcig
T02D1247:199b-42: dang po sprin lta bu mthong ba yin no //
T02D1247:199b-43: de bzhin du gong nas gong du rim par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1247:199b-44: ngo bo gcig pa yin na yang //
T02D1247:199b-45: sna tshogs pa'i snang bas 'jig rten la snang bar 'gyur te /
T02D1247:200a-2: dri ma med pa'i mig gi dbang po dang ldan
T02D1247:200a-3: pa'i skyes bu rnams kyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mi
T02D1247:200a-4: gsal ba dang / gsal ba lta bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1247:200a-5: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin te /
T02D1247:200a-6: snang ba 'ba' zhig pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1247:200a-7: de bas na slob bzhin pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i bya
T02D1247:200a-8: bas rnal 'byor gyi gnas skabs kyi dbye ba bstan
T02D1247:200a-9: pa yin no // 'di nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1247:200a-10: dngos grub sngon du sprin lta bu'i //
T02D1247:200a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1247:200a-12: re zhig dang po bla ma mnyes par byas pa'i
T02D1247:200a-13: slob mas dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1247:200a-15: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas cho ga bzhin
T02D1247:200a-16: du shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang thob pas
T02D1247:200a-17: mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bstan pa'i bla mas
T02D1247:200a-18: slob ma la gang gi tshe lhan cig skyes pa
T02D1247:200a-19: nye bar mtshon pa de'i tshe de la dngos grub
T02D1247:200a-20: kyi sngon gyi gnas skabs yin no //
T02D1247:200a-21: de gang gi phyir dbang bskur ba'i dus su slob ma de'i /
T02D1247:200a-22: lhan cig skyes pa nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
T02D1247:200a-23: sngon du ni ma byas so //
T02D1247:200a-24: gal te sngon du byas na slar yang sgyur ma
T02D1247:200a-25: lta bu la sogs pa'i gnas skabs la rim pa
T02D1247:200a-26: bzhin du ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya
T02D1247:200a-27: chen po dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang dam
T02D1247:200a-28: tshig gi phyag rgya'i sgom pa don med par 'gyur
T02D1247:200a-29: chen po dang / ba'i phyir ro // gal te
T02D1247:200a-30: mtshon par mi 'gyur na de'i sgom pa mi rigs
T02D1247:200a-31: chen po dang / ba'i phyir ro // pa'i phyir
T02D1247:200a-32: ro // de bas na sprin lta bu ni gang
T02D1247:200a-33: gi tshe las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1247:200a-34: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas slob ma la
T02D1247:200a-35: bla mas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe shes par bya'o
T02D1247:200a-36: // sprin lta bu la dpe sngon du 'gro ba'i gtan tshigs bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1247:200a-37: sprin srab pas bkab pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1247:200a-38: ji ltar srab pa'i sprin gyis bkab pa'i zla ba rgyas pa cung zad mthong bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1247:200a-39: shin tu gsal bar mthong ba ma yin na /
T02D1247:200a-40: de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa yang dngos grub
T02D1247:200a-41: kyi sngon du ni slob bzhin pa'i gnas skabs su
T02D1247:200a-42: mi gsal bar snang bar 'gyur te /
T02D1247:200a-43: sprin lta bu nyid du bstan no //
T02D1247:200a-44: 'grub na sgyu ma lta bu yi //
T02D1247:200b-0: zhes bya ba la sngar nye bar @200b mtshon pa'i
T02D1247:200b-1: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gang yin pa de
T02D1247:200b-2: nyid rgyun ma chad pa dang rtag tu dad pas
T02D1247:200b-3: bsgom zhing mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub gang yin
T02D1247:200b-4: pa de la 'byung ba lta bu ni ji ltar
T02D1247:200b-5: nor bu dang / sman dang sngags kyi mthu las
T02D1247:200b-6: 'byung ba'i sgyu ma so sor snang ba med na
T02D1247:200b-7: yang mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du yid kyis
T02D1247:200b-8: sprul pa'i rig ma'i stobs ni ye shes kyi phyag
T02D1247:200b-9: rgya'i sbyor bas ye shes gsal bar 'char bar 'gyur
T02D1247:200b-10: nor bu dang / te / sgyu ma lta bu nyid so sor bstan to //
T02D1247:200b-11: de nas rmi lam dang 'dra ba ste zhes bya
T02D1247:200b-12: ba la sogs pa la ji ltar kha cig gnyid
T02D1247:200b-13: log pas mi rtog pa nyams su myong ba de
T02D1247:200b-14: bzhin du nang gi bdag nyid kyi thabs dang /
T02D1247:200b-15: shes rab rnam par rol pa sgom par byed pa'i
T02D1247:200b-16: rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas rnal
T02D1247:200b-17: 'byor gyi gnyid log par cig car du lhan cig
T02D1247:200b-18: skyes pa nyams su myong ba yin pas rmi lam
T02D1247:200b-20: de nas rmi lam dang sad pa lta bu zhes
T02D1247:200b-21: bya ba la sogs pa la phyi rol gyi rig
T02D1247:200b-22: ma ni las dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma
T02D1247:200b-23: gnyis so // phyag rgya gnyis kyi sbyor ba las byung ba'i phyir sad pa lta bu yin no //
T02D1247:200b-24: rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid la mngon du
T02D1247:200b-25: byas pas rang gi lus dang shes rab ma'i lus
T02D1247:200b-26: yod na yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir rmi lam lta
T02D1247:200b-27: bu'o // g-yeng ba'i rgyu yod na yang zhes bya
T02D1247:200b-28: ba la g-yeng ba'i rgyu ni phyag rgya gnyis kyi
T02D1247:200b-29: bu'o // mtshan nyid do // rmi lam dang sad
T02D1247:200b-30: pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal
T02D1247:200b-31: 'byor pa la g-yeng ba'i rgyu yod na yang brtan
T02D1247:200b-32: pa la mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir sems 'ong bar
T02D1247:200b-33: bu'o // mtshan nyid do // mi 'gyur te /
T02D1247:200b-34: 'on kyang de'i dam tshig ni phyag rgya'i sbyor ba
T02D1247:200b-36: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa nyid ni de'i sdom pa'o //
T02D1247:200b-37: de ltar dam tshig dang sdom pa'i sbyor ba yod
T02D1247:200b-38: pas tha ma thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa
T02D1247:200b-39: yin no // dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
T02D1247:200b-40: dang po sprin bzhin snang ba ste //
T02D1247:200b-42: cig car du ni rmi lam 'dra //
T02D1247:200b-43: rmi lam sad pa tha mi dad //
T02D1247:200b-44: tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid 'grub //
T02D1247:200b-46: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1247:201a-0: shin tu zab pa'i dgyes pa'i @201a * //
T02D1247:201a-1: rdo rje las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D1247:201a-2: 'dis ni slob dpon gyi rang bzo yongs su spangs
T02D1247:201a-3: pas bdag gis rab tu byed pa 'di byas pa
T02D1247:201a-4: yin te zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1247:201a-5: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba bstan pa ste /
T02D1247:201a-7: lhan skyes rnal 'byor dam pa la //
T02D1247:201a-8: 'grel pa byas nas dge ba gang //
T02D1247:201a-9: bdag gis bsags pa de yis ni //
T02D1247:201a-10: 'jig rten lhan skyes rtse gcig gyur //
T02D1247:201a-11: gang zhig brjod bya rjod byed blo yis spyod yul min //
T02D1247:201a-12: gti mug tshogs kyi mtshan mo sel byed nyi ma gang //
T02D1247:201a-13: rang bdag snang bas phyogs kyi dbye ba yongs bkang ba //
T02D1247:201a-14: lhan skyes nam mkha' zla ba rdzogs 'dra de la 'dud //
T02D1247:201a-15: mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i
T02D1247:201a-16: zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i 'grel
T02D1247:201a-17: pa snying po rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes
T02D1247:201a-18: bya ba / ao rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po bram ze tha ga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1247:201a-20: // / panti ta mkhas pa chen po manta ka la
